jobDescription: Company Overview  At Nuance, we empower people with the ability to seamlessly interact with their connected devices and the digital world around them. We are creating a world where technology thinks and acts the way people do by designing the most human, natural, and intuitive ways of interacting with technology.  Our nimble technology uses analytics and advanced algorithms to transform the inanimate into animate and reduce complicated processes into simple ones.  Join our Healthcare team...caring for clinicians the way they care for patients. Beyond words. We create technology that lets clinicians capture and document care quickly and easily so they can focus their attention on their patients.  Job Summary  The PMO Intern will report to the Director of Program Management Office (PMO), to provide support of critical programs in the Nuance Healthcare Division, spoecifically CDI Next Gen. The Intern will be assigned data collection/analysis tasks, status reporting tasks, creating mini-project plans and communication plans to support these programs.  This intern will work with a more senior program manager (Kathie McCue) who is responsible for the overall CDI and CAPD portfolio, but will focus on the CDI next generation offerings to support the growth of the CDI product solutions and revenue growth.
